Battlefield - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model
A Battlefield is a matrix of Cell It has a list with all the Players that are currently play on that Battlefield
Battlefield() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Battlefield
The constructor create a matrix N*N of Cell, where N is the battlefieldSize

buildGod(Pack, Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.gui.SwingView
In case a player wants to use the power of Demeter or Hestia (the cases where you can build twice) the buttonHandler call this method (twice) to save the two targetCell.

ButtonHandler - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.gui
